thread.title: Trump heckled in Florida: "Too bad we had to throw him out"
thread.title_full: Trump heckled in Florida: "Too bad we had to throw him out"

title: Trump heckled in Florida: "Too bad we had to throw him out"
text:
Trump heckled in Florida: "Too bad we had to throw him out" Friday, October 23, 2015 - 01:21 
Republican Presidential Candidate Donald Trump is heckled during a campaign rally in Florida, says, ''that's what the country's all about, we've got to be able to speak.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
ROUGH CUT (NO REPORTER NARRATION) U.S Republican Presidential Candidate Donald rallied at Trump National Doral in Florida on Friday -- a fitting location to campaign. Not long into his speech, Trump was interrupted by a heckler who was eventually escorted out of the venue. But the 2016 presidential hopeful wasn't too hard on the heckler. "You can get him out, but don't hurt him," Trump told security guards. "That's what the country's all about, you've got to be able to speak... too bad we had to throw him out. But sometimes you have to throw people out." Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code http://reut.rs/1MK1xzm
